data.name: SCDC_Cancel_ConfirmBody
data.value:
Cancel this service call?
This will: • Mark the ticket as Canceled • Close it now (sets FinishDate) • NOT deduct any inventory • Clear any pending item selections • Set household to Operational

data.name: SCDC_Cancel_Success
data.value: Service canceled. Household set to Operational. No stock deducted.
